name: Anaplan
description: Anaplan is building a future where connected leaders and teams are able to constantly adapt, transform and reinvent their businesses. We make it possible to share actionable insights, empower and unleash creativity, and drive innovation. With Anaplan, finance and operational leaders across the organization can model complex scenarios, forecast continuously with added intelligence, and make agile decisions with confidence.
features: 2,000+ market-leading customers, including over half of the Fortune 50

200+ accomplished partners,
prioritizing our mutual clients
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Unlock Decision Excellence
ShortDescription: The future of planning is here. Let's get connected.

Highlights.name: Enterprise-wide connected planning
Highlights.description: Connect your entire enterprise on a single platform, scaling as you grow and handling real-time changes at any size.

Highlights.name: Scalable, intelligent architecture
Highlights.description: Gives you that all-important agility to adapt and pivot as your market changes.

Highlights.name: Incredible time to value
Highlights.description: With no time to waste, give all your users a powerful, intuitive planning experience – fast.

enhanced_description: Anaplan is a comprehensive platform designed for enterprise-wide connected planning, enabling finance and operational leaders across the organization to constantly adapt, transform, and reinvent their businesses. It facilitates sharing actionable insights, empowering creativity, and driving innovation. With Anaplan, users can model complex scenarios, forecast continuously with added intelligence, and make agile decisions with confidence, ultimately unlocking decision excellence. The platform offers a scalable and intelligent architecture that adapts to market changes and delivers incredible time to value, providing a powerful and intuitive planning experience.
competitive_advantages: Enterprise-wide connected planning on a single platform
Scalable and intelligent architecture for adaptability and agility
Rapid time to value for powerful and intuitive planning
Proven track record with over 2,000 market-leading customers, including over half of the Fortune 50
roi_benefits: Faster time to value for planning initiatives
scalability_features: Ability to scale as the enterprise grows
Handles real-time changes at any size
